paper_abstract: Motivated by the setting of reproducing kernel Hilbert space (RKHS) and its extensions considered in machine learning, we propose an RKHS framework for image and video colorization. We review and study RKHS especially in vectorial cases and provide various extensions for colorization problems. Theory as well as a practical algorithm is proposed with a number of numerical experiments.
paper_title: Image and Video Colorization Using Vector-Valued Reproducing Kernel Hilbert Spaces
